project_abstract.cdata: The project's objectives are to:  (a) improve Henan's road network; (b) strengthen highway sector agencies; and (c) make recommendations for improving the efficiency of road freight transport services.  The project consists of: (a) civil works comprising construction of a 120 km, two-lane expressway between Zhengzhou and Luoyang; rehabilitation and improvement in northwest Henan of five provincial roads and six rural roads, mainly located in poor areas; and a road improvement program for rehabilitating and upgrading provincial and rural roads throughout the province; (b) equipment for highway maintenance and operations, including environmental monitoring; and (c) an institutional strengthening and reform component, which will: provide equipment and training to five key agencies of Henan's Communications Department; offer a comprehensive training program for highway personnel at all levels; and study trucking services in the Province and ways to improve its efficiency.

P003581.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>河南省公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：（1）改善河南路网条件；（2）增强公路行业机构能力；（3）就如何提升公路货运服务效率提出建议。项目设有三个子项目：（1）土建工程子项目，内容为建设120公路两车道郑州至洛阳高速公路，改造河南省西北部五条省级公路和六条农村公路，实施公路改造工程，对全省省级公路和农村公路进行升级改造；（2）公路养护运行设备子项目，包括环境监测设备；（3）机构加强和改革子项目，内容为向河南省交通厅五个主要部门提供设备和培训，向各级公路管理人员提供全面培训，就河南省卡车运输服务和提高服务效率的方法开展研究。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
